name: Crazy Zen Codeword
storyline:
Engage in some serious brain training with classic and fast codeword play modes. In classic mode you will need to master the subtleties of classic pen-and-paper codeword gameplay to prevail.

Fast mode is great as a simplified introduction to codewords or for when you want a quicker play session. With satisfying, instant feedback on every correct guess and less chance of getting seriously stuck!

Are you up for the challenge? Expand your vocabulary - discover new words. Collect, study, and play about with them using a special Trophy Poems system. Share the poems you’ve created with your fridge magnet word collection!
summary: It's codeword! The classic pen and paper puzzle. In this translation from paper to screen, animated highlights make it is easier to read the state of the board and autofill makes it much quicker to try out different letter combinations. Simply use the letter picker to fill in the grey blanks and find as many words as you can to complete the board! Remember that every letter used can only be used once, so choose wisely. Crazy Zen Codeword. For the wordsmiths, English Language enthusiasts, and boredom fighters alike!
